summary:
Open for new opportunities Subsurface Specialist with over 12 years of international oil and gas industry experience in multinational companies. Exploration Geology background, native Russian/Ukrainian speaker with proficient knowledge of English and Dutch languages, strong emphasis on Integrated Reservoir Modelling, Petrophysics, passionate about Technical Information and Data Management. Fully aware of integrated projects and studies workflows both in Venture and Asset type Organization.

Being critical part of any subsurface evaluation always strive to deliver quality product on time, managing expectations and achieving best results through effective communication within the team and senior management across the organization. Combining analytical skills with broader background capable of processing big volumes of various data (well data, state balance reserves, geological reports, etc.) in order to identify early risks and flag potential issues upfront to streamline decision making process thus achieving cost efficiency by out-of-the box thinking and “early profitability” mindset. Comfortable and effective team player with clear focus on decision driven deliverables, coaching experience, stress resilient. 

Open to new horizons and willing to develop into broad-based technical professional within oil and gas industry.
